description:
A ghost from the past haunts Tsubasa, draining the life from her. Who is the mysterious young man, and what role did he play in the past? But the trouble is just beginning for the Kurogane House!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grudge! The longest Day of the Kurogane House (First Part)
Ikon! Kuroganeya no Ichiban Nagai Hi (Zenpen)
¡Rencor! ¡El día más largo de la Mansión Kurogane! (1ª Parte)
遺恨! くろがね屋の一番長い日 (前編)
